title: Embroidered Picture, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, glass beads, pearls, hair, and cotton
Technique: embroidered in couching,stem, chain, and feather stitches with applique of knitted, woven fabric and needle-made lace on 7/1 satin foundation
description: A copy of a 17th century raised work picture of King Charles I and Queen Catherine of Braganza.  Picture is meant to look like a 17th century picture (N.B. 1649 date).

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk, metal, glass beads, pearls, hair, and cotton
Technique: embroidered in couching,stem, chain, and feather stitches with applique of knitted, woven fabric and needle-made lace on 7/1 satin foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-110.
